Parameters: String: Prefix of name to give the suite being built.
named(java.lang.String).Description: Override the default name for the suite being built. This should generally be called if you call addRequirements(com.android.internal.util.Predicate[]) to make it clear which tests will be included. The name you specify is automatically prefixed with the package containing the tests to be run. If more than one package is specified, the first is used.
named(java.lang.String).history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 26

Parameters: Class: Use the class from your .apk. Use the class name for the test suite name. Use the class' classloader in order to load classes for testing. This is needed when running in the emulator.
TestSuiteBuilder(java.lang.Class).Description: The given name is automatically prefixed with the package containing the tests to be run. If more than one package is specified, the first is used.

Parameters: String: Names of packages to add.
includePackages(java.lang.String...).Description: Include all tests that satisfy the requirements in the given packages and all sub-packages, unless otherwise specified.
includePackages(java.lang.String...).history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 26

includeAllPackagesUnderHere().Description: Include all junit tests that satisfy the requirements in the calling class' package and all sub-packages.
includeAllPackagesUnderHere().history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 26

Returns: The package and suite name combined.
getSuiteName().Description: Subclasses use this method to determine the name of the suite.
getSuiteName().history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 26

Parameters: String: Names of packages to remove.
excludePackages(java.lang.String...).Description: Exclude all tests in the given packages and all sub-packages, unless otherwise specified.
excludePackages(java.lang.String...).history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 26

Returns: The suite containing the requested tests.
build().Description: Call this method once you've configured your builder as desired.
build().history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 26

ClassDesc: New tests should be written using the Build suites based on a combination of included packages, excluded packages, and predicates that must be satisfied.
